str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(a) a writing, (b) a passage of scripture; plur: the scriptures. A document, i.e. Holy Writ.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
A river, torrent, stream. Probably from a derivative of the alternate of pino; a current, brook or freshet, i.e. Running water.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Neuter Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
Water. And genitive case, hudatos, etc. From the base of huetos; water literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To flow, overflow with. A primary verb; for some tenses of which a prolonged form rheuo is used to flow.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
From koilos; a cavity, i.e. the abdomen; by implication, the matrix; figuratively, the heart.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
